text: "Radioactive" is a song recorded by British recording artist Rita Ora. It was released as the fourth single from her debut studio album, Ora. The single was released on 11 February 2013. The song was co-written by Sia Furler and Greg Kurstin (who also produced the song). It is a house and R&B; song. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2013) Peak position scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Belgium Dance Bubbling Under (Ultratop Flanders) 5 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" === Certifications === ==Release history== Region Date Format Label United Kingdom 11 February 2013 Digital download Roc Nation United States 26 February 2013 ==References== Category:2012 songs Category:Dance songs Category:House songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Rita Ora songs
title: Radioactive (Rita Ora song)
